A way to "test out" a monster before you take it
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): A way to "test out" a monster before you take it
By Zilk the Rank S Master on Sunday, October 25, 2009 - 07:42 am:

I just put in a password for a rare golem but dont have the barn upgrade so I couldn't take it. Then I went to the Square to get the first upgrade but the peddler was there I thought he might go away if I accepted the challage with out a monster but it initiated a battle and my monster was the rare golem. I'll test it with a monster that I can fit in my barn and post my results.

By Zilk the Rank S Master on Monday, October 26, 2009 - 06:29 pm:

I just tested it again and it worked with a Hare ill try it a few more times to confirm this.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, October 26, 2009 - 06:42 pm:

I seem to recall something about this happening, so we'll accept it as confirmed.
